titles.title: Travel Stimulus Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a temporary deduction for travel expenses for the costs of travel after September 11, 2001, and before September 12, 2002.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 11/13/2001--Introduced. Travel Stimulus Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to temporarily allow a deduction for personal travel expenses, without regard to whether a taxpayer itemizes other deductions.
